TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit MMC_TASK_DISPLAY_OBJECT extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 指定使用影像在工作台上顯示工作或背景 (Background) 時所需的影像類型和資料型別。

span.span: Specifies the type of image and data that is required to use the image to display a task or the background on a task pad.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需使用 MMC 程式設計\_任務\_顯示器\_物件的結構和 Microsoft Management Console (MMC)，請參閱[MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the MMC\_TASK\_DISPLAY\_OBJECT structure and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).
